name: AlexTheRegent TLD-GameTweaks
description: The Long Dark: AlexTheRegent Game Tweaks

releases.name: BadgesUnlocker
releases.changes: Lock, unlock badges and feats. Configure mod via ingame mod settings

releases.name: CookingTweaks
releases.description:
Change time of food prerapation (cooking/burning) or water processing (melting/boiling/drying).

Warning: it does not change displaying cooking time in cans/pots/etc, but it will change once you start cooking!

Important: Adjust values in CookingTweaks.xml!

releases.name: DetectionRange
releases.description: Change animals detection distance. Configure mod via ingame mod settings

releases.name: FasterActionRedux
releases.description:
Do all actions way faster (nearly instant). Be careful, you can die in blink of eye, if you choose action that is very long (such as harvesting meat from bear)!

Redux of FasterActionMod by felipeds + fixed fishing.

This mod can cause visual bug "item message stuck"

releases.name: MapTweaks
releases.description: Adjust map revealing radius. Configure mod via ingame mod settings

releases.name: StruggleTweaks
releases.description: Set chance to instantly kill wolf after struggle or change bleedout time for wolf. Also you can change tap power to save your mouse buttons :). Configure mod via ingame mod settings

releases.name: TimeAccelerator
releases.description: Speed up everything in the world to travel faster or do something faster. Configure mod via ingame mod settings

releases.name: TweakRabbits
releases.description: Change duration of stun or kill rabbit instantly if hit with rock. Configure mod via ingame mod settings

releases.name: WeaponCrosshair
releases.description: Show crosshair when zooming with stone, bow, rifle. Configure mod via ingame mod settings
